message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time, Alice. Remember, time is money!
The money is losing value, Bob. This is a better offer than the last one, don't you think?
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is a good deal for both of us considering the circumstances.
Alice, I'm compromising again.  We need to settle this now before the inflation eats up any more of the pot!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer and let's be done with it!
